altername_name: Kids Station - Asobou! Hanasou! Guru Guru Town Hanamaru-kun
name: Kids Station: Asobou! Hanasou! Gurugurutaun Hanamarukun
overview: Kids Station: Asobou! Hanasou! Gurugurutaun Hanamarukun is based on the anime and features a big collection of different kind of mini games in which the young players can also learns about maths, animals, shapes, etc. There are also some mini games about coordination, move the character in the proper timing, etc.
